transcript.text: hi my name's Dan and I'm from Arizona
and I hope you'll forgive I have a few
notes so if it looks like I'm looking at
notes I am why do I believe in the
movement known as Q well because I first
believed in the reality between good and
evil that has plagued humanity since the
very beginning now my faith informs and
confirms the reality of that battle but
even if you're not a person of faith all
you have to do is look around you and
see that that battle is indeed raging
and although I have been aware of that
reality for decades it was taken the
time to objectively look into the
incredible deception that is the
official account of 9/11 that really
woke me up to the deaths of the
depravity and the corruption that
pervades our country in the world and
once I understood the utter
impossibility of the official account
being true and faced a realization that
I and a majority of Americans have been
purposely deceived in so many ways it
became crystal clear to me that I could
no longer accept what the so called
authorities or the mainstream media had
to say because they just because they
say it newsflash they lie I learned that
the media was completely willing and
capable of being fully complicit in
pulling the wool over the eyes of the
American people I observed that the very
top levels of our leadership our
so-called leadership both Republican and
Democrat were capable of looking right
into that camera and outright lying to
us why do we need cue because we need
someone we can trust to tell us the
truth I also learned that there is a
cost to sincerely seeking the truth this
is particularly true if you're a
self-identified
Rolle who wants to objectively seek
truth outside of the echo chamber
however it also happens to conservatives
entering in to the 9/11 truth movement I
personally saw how sincere people who
were only seeking truthful answers to
legitimate questions were ridiculed and
worse and don't even get me started
about what happens to someone who
sincerely and objectively dares to
broach the questions such as abortion or
transgenderism or heaven forbid our
black brothers and sisters who dared
across the line in support a
conservative perspective or for that
matter what happens to a president who
finally has the courage to call out the
media for their decades-old incredible
bias in their reporting I'm using the
9/11 deception as an example which has
extremely valid correlations to current
day deceptive narratives that are being
foisted upon the American people about
cue and about President Trump like many
Americans I was simply too busy and too
lazy to challenge the narrative that was
being spoon-fed to me by our politicians
the mainstream median the Hollywood
elite however once I made the time to do
the research what I have learned has
truly been the most eye-opening and
freeing experience of my life outside of
my relationship with my creator so many
questions started falling into place and
the answers to those questions started
falling into place at the point of my
awakening I was no longer a slave to
political correctness and I am
unapologetic about my lack of respect
for people who hold to the political
correct crowd I have found that most
people who align themselves
with the left in particular have a
miserable time explaining or defending
their positions very few liberals can
carry on a thoughtful and rational
debate without devoting into some kind
of name-calling or emotionally charged
rant or they simply pull a Scarlett
O'Hara and say diddly deee and walk away
when the questions get too tough outside
of their echo chamber they really are
very weak and shallow and inseparably
self-righteous it's wonderful to see
that just because one has been sucked
into the liberal cesspool doesn't mean
they have to stay there and I encourage
everyone to check out the great hashtag
walkaway movement videos because they
have rallied on their politicians or
relied rather on their politicians the
complicit leftist views entertainment
and social media and the celebrity crowd
to dictate their positions to them they
are too lazy to check out things for
themselves and why should they most of
the people they hang with and their
college professors hold the same views
it's much easier to just fall in line
and pay no attention to that man behind
the curtain that's what I love about the
Q & R movement Q doesn't tell us what to
think they challenge us to think and do
some of our own research if you are not
already one of us I challenge you to
challenge yourself to take an objective
look at the Q movement and compare what
you find to what you are being fed by
your politicians and the mainstream
media get to get started ask yourself
some of these things where exactly did
President Trump come from the President
of the United States never ran before
for a political office not even dog
catcher here is an exceptionally
successful businessmen with an
incredible the gifted wife and family he
didn't want for much in terms of comfort
or fulfilling lifestyle do you really
believe that he would sacrifice all that
to get into the middle of the cesspool
that is American politics just for the
fun of it or for ego gratification come
on now can you separate yourself from
the brainwashing the media has attempted
to effect on you really now what is is
it what is it that Donald Trump has done
to earn such hatred and vitriol from the
left that they spent so much time and
energy to express try to resist the
temptation to say that he brought this
animus on upon himself they hated him
from the minute he captured the
Republican nomination after all how dare
he this beginning politician how dare he
challenged their precious princess of
Darkness Hillary Clinton he has been one
of the few leaders in a very long time
with the courage to express the
righteous indignation that the
mainstream media so richly has deserved
for years just ask yourself and remember
you're doing your best to be objective
if even after eight years Obama would
have accomplished even half of what
President Trump has accomplished in a
year and a half what do you think the
media and the rest of the chattering
classes would be saying they would
likely be pushing for an amendment to
the Constitution extending the number of
terms the president can survive that can
serve hell they probably do away with
elections altogether and crown him King
you have to admit what President Trump
has accomplished so far with not one
ounce of help from the obstructionist in
Congress or support
at all just just a support of being
even-handed from the feckless mainstream
media is pretty impressive not to
mention the distraction that this
ridiculous witch-hunt known as the
russian collusion case has been can you
imagine what could be accomplished with
an opposition party that cared more
about doing well for the american people
than trying to destroy president Trump
why do i follow q because the
information that q and his magnificent
team of supporters are getting now is
the roadmap for restoring america to the
country that we can and should be it's
not a conspiracy theory that our
government has become almost irreparably
corrupt it is fact if you can't see that
you simply have not done your homework
to weed out this level of corruption
that our country has become involved in
is extremely difficult it's like trying
to rip fresh meat from a lion's mouth
that lion isn't going to make it easy
that's why we need a well-conceived plan
and if you are willing to listen
q communicates that plan to the real
power in this country the people if you
refuse to accept the narrative that the
corrupt establishment is trying so very
hard to sell you and instead make a
decision to check you out for yourself
you will find an amazing group of
peace-loving sincere patriots who only
seek truth and freedom you will be
joining with not only Americans but
Patriots the world over who are
committed to taking part in one of the
greatest moves of restoration in the
history of man what you learn on this
journey may very well
challenged much of what you currently
hold to be true that's okay there are
many who have gone before you but if
it's truth and integrity that you're
after and then leaving behind falsehood
and corruption will be the most
rewarding and freeing thing you have
ever participated in just a word of
warning if you are a left-leaning person
you're gonna find that the oh so
tolerant left isn't if you decide to
challenge yourself and go on this
journey and you have generally counted
yourself among the politically correct
crowd don't be surprised when those oh
so tolerant leftist that you've hung
with and now show you their good dose of
they're not so tolerant side but
whatever the cost the reward of truth
and freedom and liberty is worth the
price and we would love to have you
climb aboard our movement now to get
started on your journey check out some
of the YouTube sites like citizens
investigative report with Katie gee and
praying medic be aware that there are
sites out there that are definitely
disinformation sites the government and
the power to be don't want you to learn
the truth but I can guarantee you these
two sites at least will give you a great
start and in at least a context to
decide you know about further
investigation that you'll want to do it
won't take you long to see that our
movement is not at all what you may have
been led to believe
it is kitty I want to thank you so much
for the work you do and for providing
this forum where we go one we go all
